title: transport - Restrict line protocols to `ssh`

description: transport: Manage line transport protocols. Accessed in configuration mode under `line`. (Restrict line protocols to `telnet`)

title: configure - Configure from the terminal

description: configure: Enter configuration mode. (Back out one level in configuration mode)

title: configure - Exit out of configuration mode
description: configure: Enter configuration mode. (Exit out of configuration mode)

title: erase - Erase the startup configuration
description: erase: Delete preset things. (Erase the startup configuration)

description: erase: Delete preset things. (Erase a filesystem)

title: reload - Reboot the system
description: reload: Control reboot behavior. (Reboot the system)

description: reload: Control reboot behavior. (Reboot after `n` seconds)

description: reload: Control reboot behavior. (Cancel pending reboots)

title: clock - Enter privileged execution mode
description: clock: Set the system clock. (Enter privileged execution mode)

description: clock: Set the system clock. (Auto negotiate with the far end of the link, defaulting to passive-clock)

description: clock: Set the system clock. (Show the current clock mode negotiated by the firmware)

description: line: Manage lines. Accessed in configuration mode. (Configure lines from 0 to 15)

description: enable: Enter privileged execution mode. (Enter privileged execution mode)

description: interface: Manage interfaces. Accessed in configuration mode. (Set an interface to be active or inactive (this is run inside the interface command))

description: crypto: Manage cryptography. Accessed in configuration mode. (Remove all keys)
